akei sokeiþ mis usqiman, unte waurd mein ni gamot in izwis.
JOHN 8.38 ik þatei gasaƕ at attin meinamma rodja, jah jus þatei hausideduþ fram attin izwaramma taujiþ.
JOHN 8.39 andhofun jah qeþun du imma:
atta unsar Abraham ist.
qaþ im Iesus:
iþ barna Abrahamis weseiþ, waurstwa Abrahamis tawidedeiþ.
JOHN 8.40 iþ nu sokeiþ mik usqiman, mannan izei sunja izwis rodida, þoei hausida fram guda;
þatuh Abraham ni tawida.
JOHN 8.41 jus taujiþ toja attins izwaris.
þanuh qeþun imma:
weis us horinassau ni sijum gabauranai;
ainana attan aigum, guþ.
JOHN 8.42 qaþ du im Iesus:
jabai guþ atta izwar wesi, friodedeiþ þau mik, unte ik fram guda urrann jah qam;
nih þan auk fram mis silbin ni qam, ak is mik insandida.
JOHN 8.43 duƕe maþlein meina ni kunnuþ?
unte ni maguþ hausjan waurd mein.
JOHN 8.44 jus us attin diabaulau sijuþ jah lustuns þis attins izwaris wileiþ taujan.
jains manamaurþrja was fram frumistja jah in sunjai ni gastoþ;
unte nist sunja in imma.
þan rodeiþ liugn, us seinaim rodeiþ, unte liugnja ist jah atta is.
JOHN 8.45 iþ ik, þatei sunja rodida, ni galaubeiþ mis.
JOHN 8.46 ƕas izwara gasakiþ mik bi frawaurht?
þande sunja qiþa, duƕe ni galaubeiþ mis?
JOHN 8.47 sa wisands us guda waurda gudis hauseiþ;
duþe jus ni hauseiþ, unte us guda ni sijuþ.
JOHN 8.48 andhofun þan þai Iudaieis jah qeþun du imma:
niu waila qiþam weis þatei Samareites is þu jah unhulþon habais?
JOHN 8.49 andhof Iesus:
ik unhulþon ni haba, ak swera attan meinana, jah jus unsweraiþ mik.
JOHN 8.50 ik ni sokja hauhein meina;
ist saei sokeiþ jah stojiþ.
JOHN 8.51 amen amen qiþa izwis:
jabai ƕas waurd mein fastaiþ, dauþu ni gasaiƕiþ aiwa dage.
JOHN 8.52 þanuh qeþun du imma þai Iudaieis:
nu ufkunþedum þatei unhulþon habais.
Abraham gadauþnoda jah praufeteis, jah þu qiþis:
jabai ƕas mein waurd fastai, ni kausjai dauþau aiwa dage.
JOHN 8.53 ibai þu maiza is attin unsaramma Abrahama, saei gadauþnoda?
jah praufeteis gadauþnodedun.
ƕana þuk silban taujis þu?
JOHN 8.54 andhof Iesus:
jabai ik hauhja mik silban, so hauheins meina ni waihts ist;
ist atta meins saei hauheiþ mik, þanei jus qiþiþ þatei
guþ unsar ist.
JOHN 8.55 jah ni kunnuþ ina;
iþ ik kann ina;
jah jabai qeþjau þatei ni kunnjau ina, sijau galeiks izwis liugnja;
ak kann ina jah waurd is fasta.
JOHN 8.56 Abraham atta izwar sifaida ei gaseƕi dag meinana, jah gasaƕ jah faginoda.
JOHN 8.57 þanuh qeþun þai Iudaieis du imma:
fimf tiguns jere nauh ni habais jah Abraham saƕt?
JOHN 8.58 qaþ im Iesus:
amen amen qiþa izwis:
faurþizei Abraham waurþi, im ik.
JOHN 8.59 þanuh nemun stainans, ei waurpeina ana ina;
iþ Iesus þan gafalh sik jah usiddja us alh usleiþands þairh midjans ins, jah ƕarboda swa.
JOHN 9.1 Jah þairhgaggands gaumida mann blindamma us gabaurþai.
JOHN 9.2 þaruh frehun ina siponjos is qiþandans:
rabbei, ƕas frawaurhta, sau þau fadrein is, ei blinds gabaurans warþ?
JOHN 9.3 andhof Iesus:
nih sa frawaurhta nih fadrein is, ak ei bairhta waurþeina waurstwa gudis ana imma.
JOHN 9.4 ik skal waurkjan waurstwa þis sandjandins mik, unte dags ist;
qimiþ nahts, þanei ni manna mag waurkjan.
JOHN 9.5 þan in þamma fairƕau im, liuhaþ im þis fairƕaus.
JOHN 9.6 þata qiþands gaspaiw dalaþ, jah gawaurhta fani us þamma spaiskuldra, jah gasmait imma ana augona þata fani þamma blindin, JOHN 9.7 jah qaþ du imma:
gagg þwahan in swumsl Siloamis, þatei gaskeirjada insandiþs.
galaiþ jah afþwoh jah qam saiƕands.
JOHN 9.8 þanuh garaznans jah þai saiƕandans ina faurþis, þatei is bidagwa was, qeþun:
niu sa ist saei sat aihtronds?
JOHN 9.9 sumaih qeþun: þatei sa ist;
sumaih þatei galeiks þamma ist;
iþ is qaþ: þatei
